text: wama qadaru l-laha haqqa qadrihi idh qalu ma anzala l-lahu ʿala basharin min shayin qul man anzala l-kitaba alladhi jaa bihi musa nuran wahudan lilnnasi tajʿalunahu qaratisa tub'dunaha watukh'funa kathiran waʿullim'tum ma lam taʿlamu antum wala abaukum quli l-lahu thumma dharhum fi khawdihim yalʿabuna
